title: Regularity of the $p$-Gauss curvature flow with flat side
authors: Genggeng Huang, Xu-Jia Wang and Yang Zhou
abstract:
We study the regularity of the $p$-Gauss curvature flow with flat side. In
our previous paper(arxiv:2403.12292), we obtained the regularity of the
interface, namely the boundary of the flat part. In this paper, we study the
regularity of the convex hypersurface near the interface.
